name: New Candy: Pop Blast Star
description:
New and improved sweet candy casual game comes!
Through over 100 addictive amazing candy puzzles! Collect more candies stars as best you can!
New Candy - Pop Blast Star features:
- Sweet and shinning candies
- Over 100 interesting levels
- Very small size but stunning effects
- Time-limit mode and Moves-limit mode
- Leaderboards to watch your friends and competitors!
